item.title: The average effective tariff rate in the United States has reached 18.6%, the highest level since 1933.
item.description: September 8th. The tariff tracking tool jointly established by the World Trade Organization and the International Monetary Fund indicates that by the 7th, the United States' trade-weighted average tariff rate on all global products has risen to 20.11%, which is notably higher than the 2.44% at the beginning of the year. The data reveals that the United States' simple average tariff rate on all global products has increased from 2.08% at the start of the year to 17.39% on the 7th. The global trade volume affected has soared from $2.8846 trillion at the beginning of the year to the current $27.47 trillion. A report issued by the Yale University Budget Lab on the 7th, which has been monitoring the long-term impact of US tariff policies, shows that with the continuous adjustment of US tariff policies, its current average effective tariff rate has reached 18.6%, the highest level since 1933. (Jinshi)

item.title: Cryptocurrency Market Capitalization Surges Above $4 Trillion, 24-hour Increase Reaches 1.7%
item.description: On August 9th, based on CoinGecko data, the market capitalization of cryptocurrencies has witnessed a 24-hour increase of 1.7%, exceeding $4 trillion and currently standing at $4.021 trillion. The 24-hour trading volume of the cryptocurrency market is $1377.554 billion.

item.title: On-Chain Data: Whales Acquired Over 50 Million XRP in the Last 48 Hours
item.description: On August 9th, cryptocurrency analyst @ali_charts presented on-chain data indicating that within the past 48 hours, whales collectively enhanced their XRP holdings by more than 50 million coins.

item.title: Simon Yuen: Hong Kong Insurance Companies Actively Embrace Advanced Technologies such as AI, Big Data, Blockchain, etc. AXA Hong Kong has Successfully Redomiciled
item.description: September 8th. Paul Chan, the Financial Secretary of Hong Kong, declared that Hong Kong insurance companies are earnestly embracing advanced technologies like AI, big data, and blockchain to prompt the transformation of the industry. They are currently capable of enhancing customer experience and operational efficiency by means of digitalized claims, personalized insurance products, and intelligent risk assessment. As one of the initial insurance companies to relocate back to Hong Kong, AXA Hong Kong has manifested a firm confidence in Hong Kong's status as an international financial center.

item.title: Binance Alpha has launched Baby Shark Universe (BSU)
item.description: On August 9th, Binance Alpha has now initiated Baby Shark Universe (BSU).

item.title: Binance Alpha's new BSU single-entry opening profit is approximately $32.6
item.description: On August 9th, based on market information, Baby Shark Universe (BSU) has been listed on Binance Alpha. It is currently trading at $0.071, and the market capitalization is $11.72 million.Each eligible user can receive an airdrop of 510 BSU tokens. The estimated value of a single airdrop at the current price is approximately $32.6.

item.title: Bitcoin Breaks $117,000, 24-hour Change 0.39%
item.description: On August 9th, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin exceeded $11,700, and the 24-hour percentage change was 0.39%.

item.title: 9 years ago, an ancient whale who had accumulated ETH at an average price of $7.7 sold 4723 coins today, worth $19.55 million.
item.description: On August 9th, according to EmberCN's monitoring, an ancient whale that had accumulated 14,945 ETH at an average price of $7.7 nine years ago sold ETH again today. Both sell-offs were priced above $4,000. Last December, this whale sold 7,808 ETH at a price of $4,005 and exchanged it for 31.27 million USDT. 3 hours ago, the whale continued to sell 4,723 ETH at a price of $4,141 and exchanged it for 19.55 million USDT. Currently, the whale still holds 2,414 ETH, which is worth $10.04 million.

item.title: Kaito AI Capital Launchpad Project Billions Amends Public Sale Terms and Extends Deadline
item.description: On August 9th, Kaito AI announced that the Capital Launchpad project Billions has adjusted its public sale terms. The public sale valuation has been revised from $2 billion to $1 billion, and the unlock amount at TGE has been changed from 75% to 100%. The public sale deadline has been extended to August 12th at 11:00 (UTC+8).Kaito's official 0xWenMoon previously stated that Capital Launchpad is not a meme token issuance platform but is similar to the on-chain crypto angel investment platform Echo and may support investors in participating in early-stage high-potential crypto projects.

item.title: Glassnode: Recent data indicates that ETH has seen a influx of new buyers, while existing holders are also willing to accumulate at higher levels
item.description: On August 9th, Glassnode announced on social media that in the past few days, there has been a notable increase in first-time buyers and momentum buyers in ETH. This indicates that the market has not only attracted new capital but also that existing holders are willing to raise their cost basis, resulting in a significant surge in on-chain activity.
